expertise: Mobile Development in Swift and React Native

education.degree: Bachelor of Electrical and Electronics Engineering

career_profile: Dedicated Information Technology graduate with strong academic background & extensive knowledge in information technology, and technical support. A passionate self-taught web and mobile application developer determined to grow in the field of Software Engineering. A hardworking and detail-oriented individual with a highly professional attitude, productive workflow, strong debugging and problem solving, relationship-building skills and ability to perform well in a team. Looking for an entry level opportunity in a dynamic organization where my skills will be fully utilized.
core_qualifications: Demonstrate a strong IT academic background with entry level expertise in any kind of technological role.
Proficient in a range of computer systems, languages, tools and testing methodologies.
Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills to identify key technology and business processes.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Extensive knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals in object-oriented design, data structure and algorithm, problem solving, and complexity analysis.
Strong base on dynamically typed JavaScript language, worked in different project-level websites.
Deep knowledge on Front-end JavaScript framework React, Redux connecting to backend services like firebase and NodeJS.
One year of experience in Flutter Mobile cross-platform technology.
